content: I just added a guest user to my new instance where there is a slack import. The guest cannot see the the "imported from slack" topics, but it can see new topics created after the import (and before the test user was invited). Is there something special about the "imported from slack" topics? What are the rules for what history guests are allowed to see?
@cypherpunks good question. I believe guest users are limited to the history received after their join the organization.
I think it probably makes sense to offer a way to mark a stream so that guest users can see history, basically a "public stream with shared history for guests" flag.
in my case though my guest user is able to see a topic i created before the guest was invited, and is only not able to see the "imported from slack" topic
@cypherpunks that may be an artifact of how we backfill into a newly created account's history recent messages on their initial set of streams.
